Name: pterygium
Definition: A corneal disease that is characterized by a triangular tissue growth located_in cornea of the eye that is the result of collagen degeneration and fibrovascular proliferation.

Name: sclerocornea
Definition: A corneal disease in which the cornea blends with sclera

Name: cornea plana
Definition: A corneal disease that is characterized by a flat cornea where the radus of curvature is less than 43 D.

Name: megalocornea
Definition: A corneal disease that is characterized by a bilaterally enlarged corneal diameter without an increase in intraocular pressure and that has_material_basis_in mutation in the CHRDL1 gene.

Name: Peters anomaly
Definition: A corneal disease characterized by a central corneal leukoma and absence of the posterior corneal stroma and Descemet membrane that has_material_basis_in mutation in the PAX6 gene on chromosome 11p13

Name: keratoconus
Definition: A corneal disease characterized by structural changes within the cornea causing it to thin and change

Name: pseudopterygium
Definition: A female reproductive system disease that is located_in the ovary.
Synonym: chronic Glomerulonephritis with Lesion of Membranous Glomerulonephritis

Name: corneal edema
Definition: A female reproductive system disease that is located_in the ovary.

Name: corneal deposit
Definition: A commensal Clostridium infectious disease that is caused by ingestion of food contaminated with Clostridium perfringens

Name: Bowman's membrane folds or rupture
Definition: A syndrome that is a neurological disorder affecting the pupil of the eye and the autonomic nervous system. It is characterized by one eye with a pupil that is larger than normal and constricts slowly in bright light (tonic pupil)

Name: corneal degeneration
Definition: A prolapse of female genital organ that is characterized by the descent of the urethra from the normal anatomic location toward or through the vaginal opening.

Name: corneal staphyloma
Definition: A coccidiosis that involves infection of the intestine with the parasitic protozoan Cyclospora cayetanensis

Name: corneal argyrosis
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that results in septicemic infection

Name: corneal ectasia
Definition: A Pseudomonas infectious disease that is caused by a Gram-negative bacterium Pseudomonas aeruginosa resulting in pulmonary edema. This bacterium releases immunogenic bacterial components that can gain access to airway epithelium and immune cells in the lung thus causing airway inflammation. P. aeruginosa is the common cause of hospital acquired and ventilator-associated pneumonias.

Name: obsolete Opisthorchis viverrini infectious disease
Definition: A opisthorchiasis that involves parasitic infection of the liver

Name: obsolete congenital syphilitic meningitis
Definition: A opisthorchiasis that involves parasitic infection of the liver

Name: keratopathy
Definition: A sweat gland disease that is characterized by inflammation of the apocrine sweat glands and has_symptom erythema

Name: corneal dystrophy
Definition: A corneal dystrophy that is characterized by corneal haze

Name: obsolete primary Enterobacteriaceae infectious disease
Definition: A corneal dystrophy that is characterized by corneal haze

Name: keratitis
Definition: A corneal disease that is characterized by inflammation of the cornea.
